about_the_game:
In a universe full of fantasy and secrets, you play as Pim, a clumsy, easily scared red panda. Pim will accidentally unleash one of the oldest threats of the world, and he will have to face his greatest fears for the greater good.



The trapers were released! These symbiotic beings can merge with things to scare off and attack everything. Travel through the islands of the archipelago by sealing these creatures for once and for all!



Pim is way too fearful to face his enemies alone, he will meet great heroes throughout his journey, and in order to fight against the threat of the trapers, he will have to support several heroes by overcoming their shortcomings with his elemental fruits and unique skills!



Throughout your journey, there will be several types of hurdles blocking your path. Make use of your different skills to solve the enigmas present in the different environments of Tercera!



Discover the multiple frescos hidden within the archipelago, and then you will be able to understand the origin of the world, who are the tercerians, who are the divine beings that roam around the world, and of course, who Pim really is.
